note all the risk factors. Interview “unbooked” women as if they are attending antenatal clinic for the first time.
• Note the nature of labour pains (onset, frequency, duration), show, vaginal bleeding, fetal movements,
passage of liquor and any other relevant symptoms.
Physical examination 
• Note the psychological state, record the vitals (heart rate, temperature, blood pressure, respiratory rate) and
any oedema or pallor.
